revised_title: Trichromatic Theory of Colour Vision: The Measurement of Retinal Fatigue
tldr: The author describes a method to measure retinal fatigue and its impact on color vision, demonstrating that color-blindness can be induced by fatiguing the retina. The study uses a trichromatic theory to analyze the effects of different colors on the retina and provides insights into the relationship between color perception and retinal fatigue.
